description:
Think email marketing is old-fashioned? Think again. With a return on investment (ROI) of 4300%, email marketing is still the most cost-effective marketing tool on the planet.

Why? Because the message goes straight to a very personal environment — your customer’s inbox — making it the most direct form of communication.

Ok, so how do you build a subscriber list?

That’s where GetResponse comes into play. We offer a comprehensive email marketing course — free for GetResponse customers. It includes everything you need to know to grow your list by up to 10,000 subscribers in as little as 90 days.

And now we’re offering you the first 10 lessons, completely free of charge — even if you’re not a GetResponse Customer. This gives you a unique opportunity to try the initial lessons and decide whether to grab the full program and grow your list by up to 10,000 new subscribers.

Whether you’re a beginner or an email marketing pro, you’ll find useful insights on how to:

  • Grow your contact base
  • Create beautiful, effective emails
  • Increase the reach of your emails
  • Boost conversions
  • Combine online marketing tools

… and you’ll even get useful tips you can post on your blog.

After completing the 10 lessons, you may decide to take the full GetResponse List Building Program. It comes in two plans: the 90-day fast-track schedule and the 180-day standard plan for those with busy schedules.

Even if you’re not a GetResponse customer, you can enroll in the full program. Just start a 30-day free trial, no credit card required. It entitles you to sign up for the full program at no charge.

But wait! There’s more! (Yikes, pardon my infomercial moment.) Each participant who completes the full program receives a GetResponse University Certificate of Performance. Imagine how proud your mom will be.
title: GetResponse Email List Building Program
